data.text: @JimJustice_WV @SecWar @POTUS We, the people of Iran, need your support. The U.S. has always stood for human rights—make sure those values are front and center in Iran negotiations.#KingRezaPahlavi

@JimJustice_WV @SecWar @POTUS We, the people of Iran, say over 40,000 of our people have been killed by the regime. We do not want negotiations with this regime. We respectfully ask the world: please don’t focus only on nuclear issues. Stand with the Iranian people and support our basic freedoms.

@JimJustice_WV @SecWar @POTUS Trump and Netanyahu promised support.
Iranians got more prisons, more executions, more graves.
Why are our murderers still being negotiated with?
#IranMassacre #RezaPahlavi 
#IranianRevolution2026 https://t.co/giT1kJDHe9
@JimJustice_WV @SecWar @POTUS We, the people of Iran, do not want nuclear negotiations. We want freedom. Free us from these terrorists.

@JimJustice_WV @SecWar @POTUS Nuclear talks are meaningless to us. Iranians demand freedom and the dismantling of the Islamic Republic. Appeasing this regime only fuels repression and executions. Stand with the people of Iran.

@JimJustice_WV @SecWar @POTUS Iran has been shattered: over 40,000 dead, countless families destroyed, a nation living in terror.This regime has no legitimacy, and negotiating with it accomplishes nothing—it is all lies. True freedom can only come when this regime is completely eliminated.
#RezaPahlaviForIran

@JimJustice_WV @SecWar @POTUS No deals with the terrorist regime in Iran. Iranian people didn’t get to the streets and got massacred for the US to get a better nuclear deal!  #IranMassacare #IranRevolution2026 #KingRezaPahlavi
